Feedback: Good and clean hospital. There is great team of doctors and good OT facility. The medical facilities are all great with good in-patient post operative care by doctors, nurses. The housekeeping staff is also good but they can respond to calls from the room a little faster.
AI_Suggestion: Improve response time of housekeeping staff.
AI_insights: Good hospital with great medical facilities and team.

Feedback: Had a really bad experience during discharge. They need to be sensitive and more transparent towards the patient and his/her family.Â

Feedback: I have visited to take my second dose and Process was really smooth. Hospitality from all staffs are really appreciable. Shanti tooks good care and provide all details before vaccination. Thank you.

Feedback: My primary concern arose from the insistence on conducting multiple tests, which appeared unrelated to my condition, before initiating any treatment.
AI_Suggestion: Streamline testing procedures to focus on relevant conditions.
AI_insights: Patient concerns about unnecessary tests can impact trust.

Feedback: Good and clean hospital.  The medical facilities are all great with good in-patient post operative care by doctors, nurses. The housekeeping staff is also good but they can respond to calls from the room a little faster.

Feedback: Recently underwent a surgery for my left shoulder, the doctors are extremely good, but the management needs to be more patient oriented than money minded.

Feedback: Over all experience was good, starting from reception,lab services and doctors interaction.Doctor with whom I have had consultation was so nice.He heard me with patience and clarified all my health condition.
However,the services of front office (where we report first) need to be improved( services should be fast).
Other wise no complaints, fully satisfied.
Thanks to the Emergency doctor abhishek and Thanks to the security guard there
They have expert doctors who gives the right medicines and helps the patients recover fast.

Feedback: I really liked the service there!
Hopeless hospital. I don't know how they have got JCI and NABH. They have no value for patients or their attendants time.

Feedback: Receptionists only want money. They don't care if the doctor is 2 hrs late but give them money.
I went for my father. He has tracheostomy n all issues. They made him wait for 1 hour n said wait if you want to or go.

I called them to book an appointment, i requested for a senior doctor and seeked their years of experience, they don't want to share it, transparency is not there. when i called Appolo they give all the detail's,experience and i feel comfortable while choosing Doctor. Fortis,pls have transperency and it is right of a patient.

a very nice experience during our stay and Treatment in the Fortis Hospital from 27-7-2023 to 3-8-2023. We felt like staying in our own home. We loved the hospitality of the staff members and doctors. They are so hardworking and put efforts to ensure good health and safety of the patients. Dr. Gayathri is an excellent doctor who also provides you guidance and emotional support

Feedback: Everything is well organised with the various rooms (for photo, blood test, xray, main doctor's consultation etc) all situated around the huge waiting room with the sequence you have to follow communicated to you at the billing counter.

Feedback: While prior appointment booking is not required, you are advised to call before coming because the forms for some countries have to be printed and brought along with you (while others are available there).

Feedback: The place can get quite crowded so if you wish to get done with all formalities within 1.5-2 hours, it is better to reach there before 830am when the billing counter opens. Don't forget to pick out a token from the machine near the counter.

We are really satisfied with the service from Fortis. There is no negative point about this hospital. Well maintained and very systematic. The best part is your time will not be wasted even for 1 min. Thanks for the doctors and all other workers.

Had an emergency visit to the hospital with my father who was hospitalised for a couple of days due to a surgery. The doctors and staff of the hospital took utmost care. The best part of the hospital is that the team follows its processes and protocols so well.
